0.1.2.desc:
z17r-v0.1.2

move TH mergeless jail chests to hell logic

lampless.comment: Dont require Lamp. If true, the player may have to cross dark rooms without a light source. If youre not sure, select false.

0.3.0-dev-build-1.desc:
v0.3.0-dev-build-1

add back map toggle, fix lorule music, fix HC 4F cutscene, add big special something

randomize_dungeon_prizes.comment: Randomizes the Pendants and Portraits between Hyrule and Lorule dungeons

lc_requirement.comment: The number of Portraits (0-7) needed to trigger the Hilda cutscene to open Lorule Castle

maiamai_madness.comment: Maiamai Madness. Shuffles Maiamai into the pool, adding 100 more locations

vanes_activated.comment: Pre-activates all Weather Vanes (EXPERIMENTAL). May cause Bracelet(s) to be located in any region of Lorule.

lampless.comment: Dont require Lamp. If true, the player may have to cross dark rooms without a light source. If youre not sure, select false.

chest_size_matches_contents.comment: Alters treasure chest sizes depending on their contents: Large for Progression items, Small for everything else.
